title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.2 - Notification and advertisement of available economic development power
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.2 - Notification and advertisement of available economic development power

State Regulations

When economic development power becomes available for
allocation, the board shall solicit applications for such power by public
notice. Notice shall be in the form of newspaper advertisements or press
releases and by such other means as the board finds appropriate. Notices and
advertisements shall make reference to the allocation requirements and criteria
set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
370.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
